metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a weekend full of diggers, trains and dinosaur adventures! We've found some amazing places for you to explore, from city farms to epic playgrounds. Let's get muddy!

activities.title: Muddy Fun at Hackney City Farm
activities.description: Get up close with pigs, goats, and chickens. Explore the farm, enjoy the cafe, and maybe even try some pottery!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Perfect for getting muddy and seeing farm animals!

transport.fromHackney: 394 bus from Hackney Downs to Hackney City Farm (15 mins)
transport.tip: Look out for the chickens roaming around!

activities.title: DLR Adventure to Mudchute Farm
activities.description: Take a fun ride on the DLR and visit the biggest urban farm in Europe! See llamas, cows, and other farm animals.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Combines his love of trains (DLR!) and animals (llamas!).

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Stratford, then DLR to Mudchute (30 mins)
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for the best views!

activities.title: Olympic Park Playground Extravaganza
activities.description: Explore the massive playgrounds, including Tumbling Bay (sand & water) and Pleasure Garden (splash area in summer). Plenty of space to run around!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Endless opportunities for climbing, running, and playing in sand and water.

transport.tip: Pack a change of clothes for Tumbling Bay!

activities.title: Storytime Adventures at Discover
activities.description: Immerse yourselves in interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits. A magical place for little ones!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Lots of interactive play and dressing up, based on his favorite stories.

transport.tip: Check the schedule for character visits!

activities.title: Victoria Park Fun
activities.description: Explore two great playgrounds, a boating lake, and a deer enclosure. Perfect for a family day out.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Plenty of space to run around and see animals.

transport.fromHackney: Walk or cycle (15-20 mins), or bus
transport.tip: Take a picnic to enjoy by the lake!

activities.title: Young V&A Playtime
activities.description: Explore the under 5s play area and design workshops at this amazing museum. Something for all ages!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Hands-on play area and workshops to spark his imagination.

transport.tip: Check the schedule for workshop times.

activities.title: V&A East Storehouse Adventure
activities.description: See amazing visible storage displays at this brand new museum! Lots to explore and discover.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A new and exciting place to explore with lots of interesting objects to see.

transport.tip: Explore the Westfield shopping centre while you're there.

activities.title: Dinosaur Discovery at the Natural History Museum
activities.description: See the famous T-Rex skeleton and explore the dinosaur gallery. Don't miss the Blue Whale in Hintze Hall and the Wildlife Garden!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: DINOSAURS! Especially the T-Rex!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria Line to Green Park, then Piccadilly Line to South Kensington (45 mins)
transport.tip: Follow the tunnel from South Kensington tube to the museum.

activities.title: All Aboard at the London Transport Museum
activities.description: Climb on old buses & trains, try the tube simulator, and play in the All Aboard play zone. Don't forget the stamper trail!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Trains and buses he can climb on!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria Line to Oxford Circus, then Piccadilly Line to Covent Garden (40 mins)
transport.tube: Covent Garden or Leicester Square (Piccadilly, Northern lines)
transport.tip: Under 18s are FREE with an adult ticket!

activities.title: RAF Museum: Planes Galore!
activities.description: See huge aircraft hangers filled with amazing planes, watch the 4D cinema, and play in the outdoor playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Lots of planes and helicopters to see!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Gospel Oak, then Overground to Willesden Junction, then Jubilee Line to Colindale (1hr)
transport.tip: Check the schedule for 4D cinema show times.

activities.title: Crystal Palace Dinosaurs & Farm
activities.description: See the famous Victorian dinosaur statues on the islands! Also enjoy the farm, maze, and great playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: DINOSAUR STATUES and farm animals in one place!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then Overground to Crystal Palace (1hr)
transport.tip: Take a picnic to enjoy by the dinosaurs!

activities.title: Thames Clipper Boat Ride to Greenwich
activities.description: Take a real boat ride on the Thames Clipper from Tower Pier to Greenwich. Enjoy the views from the back of the boat!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A real boat ride on the river!

transport.fromHackney: Bus 26 to Liverpool Street, then tube to Tower Hill (40 mins)
transport.tip: Sit outside at the back of the boat for the best views!

activities.title: Maritime Adventures at Greenwich
activities.description: Explore the ships gallery and the AHOY! children's gallery (under 7s). There's also a great playground outside.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Ships and a playground to explore!

transport.fromHackney: DLR from Stratford to Cutty Sark (50 mins)
transport.tip: Take the DLR for a fun train ride!

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live!
activities.description: See Hey Duggee and the Squirrel Club live on stage! Earn badges and sing along to your favourite songs.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Hey Duggee LIVE!

transport.tip: Book tickets early as they sell out fast!

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: See life-size dinosaur puppets on stage! A thrilling and educational show for dinosaur lovers.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: LIFE-SIZE DINOSAURS!

transport.tip: Some dinosaurs can be a little scary, so be prepared!

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live!
activities.description: Join Peppa Pig and her friends for a singing and dancing adventure on stage!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Peppa Pig!

transport.tip: Get ready to sing and dance along!

activities.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
activities.description: See the classic story of The Tiger Who Came to Tea brought to life on stage.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A fun and engaging theatre show.

transport.tip: A great first theatre experience.

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: Join Bluey and Bingo in their Big Play!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Bluey is on stage!

transport.tip: Get ready to dance!

activities.title: Room on the Broom
activities.description: See the classic Julia Donaldson story come to life on stage.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A fun show!

transport.tip: A great first theatre experience.

activities.title: Half Moon Theatre Shows
activities.description: Check out the regular kid's shows at your local theatre!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A local theatre!

transport.tip: Check out their website
